name: primsatest
description: - DONE Prisma as your data modeling tool - DONE Docker-based PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MongoDB as your data store - At least 3 Query resolvers to get data from your server - At least 2 Mutation resolvers allowing users to create, update, or upsert an item. - At least 1 Mutation resolver allowing users to delete an item. - Your datastore will contain at least 25 items - Your app will be deployed to production using some service like Heroku, Digital Ocean, etc. - All of your source code will be properly uploaded to GitHub - Your ReadMe file will accurately describe your server install and run process and how to use the APIs
